text: Don't smell the liquid that the noodles are packaged in, it smells like bad fish.  Just hold your breath and rinse them good.  They taste like nothing much, except kinda like pasta.  The consistency is similar to bean sprouts.  If they were cheaper, I would be using them all the time, but a 7 oz package makes 2 servings-they count the liquid as part of the 7 ounces.  So over $2 for 2 servings, when you can have pasta for $1 for 6-8 servings.  I am not rich, so this won't work for me.
